template.content:
FROM openjdk:17-slim LABEL maintainer="ThinkGem@163.com" ENV TZ "Asia/Shanghai" ENV LANG C.UTF-8 VOLUME /tmp
WORKDIR /app
#RUN mkdir WEB-INF #ADD jeesite.lic ./WEB-INF ADD ./maven/web.war ./app.war
#ENV JAVA_OPTS "$JAVA_OPTS -Xms256m -Xmx1024m" ENV JAVA_OPTS "$JAVA_OPTS -Dspring.profiles.active=prod"
ENTRYPOINT jar -xvf app.war && rm app.war && cd WEB-INF && sh startup.sh
EXPOSE 8983
